019
020import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.paste.IPasteClient;
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.paste.IPasteable;
022import org.json.JSONObject;
023
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.io.OutputStream;
026import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
027import java.net.URL;
028import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
029import java.util.Arrays;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.Scanner;
032
033/**
034 * MCLogsClient
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 1.0.0.2
038 */
039public class MclogsClient implements IPasteClient {
040
041  private static final String MCLOGS_API_URL = "https://api.mclo.gs/1/log";
042
043  @Override
044  public String identifier() {
045
046    return "mclo.gs";
047  }
048
049  @Override
050  public String endpoint() {
051
052    return MCLOGS_API_URL;
053  }
054
055  @Override
056  public String apiKey() {
057
058    return "N/A"; // mclo.gs does not require an API key
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public Optional<String> createSingle(final IPasteable pasteable) {
063
064    return createPaste(pasteable);
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public Optional<String> createMultiple(final IPasteable... pasteables) {
069
070    return Arrays.stream(pasteables)
071            .map(this::createPaste)
072            .filter(Optional::isPresent)
073            .map(Optional::get)
074            .reduce((first, second)->second); // Return the last created paste's URL
075  }
076
077  private Optional<String> createPaste(final IPasteable pasteable) {
078
079    try {
080
081      final JSONObject requestBody = new JSONObject();
082      requestBody.put("content", pasteable.content());
083
084      final HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection)new URL(MCLOGS_API_URL).openConnection();
085      connection.setRequestMethod("POST");
086      connection.setRequestProperty("Content-Type", "application/json");
087      connection.setDoOutput(true);
088
089      try(final OutputStream os = connection.getOutputStream()) {
090
091        os.write(requestBody.toString().getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
092      }
093
094      try(final Scanner scanner = new Scanner(connection.getInputStream(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) {
095
096        final String response = scanner.useDelimiter("\\A").next();
097        final JSONObject jsonResponse = new JSONObject(response);
098
099        return Optional.of(jsonResponse.getString("url"));
100      }
101    } catch(final IOException e) {
102
103      e.printStackTrace();
104      return Optional.empty();
105    }
106  }
107}
